apiEndpoints.name: Admissions
apiEndpoints.description: List admissions within a date range

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: Accept Header [Do not change this value]

parameters.name: app_id
parameters.description: app_id (also referred to as recipient_id, provided by Kipu)

parameters.name: insurance_detail
parameters.description: Show insurance detail with phi_level: high

parameters.name: demographics_detail
parameters.description: Show demographics detail with phi_level: high

parameters.name: patient_status_detail
parameters.description: Show patient status detail with phi_level: high

parameters.name: patient_contacts_detail
parameters.description: Show patient contacts detail with phi_level: high

parameters.name: location_id
parameters.description: Location ID (Can be found through the Locations index route)

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: Accept Header [Do not change this value]

parameters.name: app_id
parameters.description: app_id (also referred to as recipient_id, provided by Kipu)

parameters.name: allergen_type
parameters.description: Only List Allergens with given allergen_type

parameters.name: starts_with
parameters.description: Only List Allergens with name starting with given string (minimum input length should be 3)

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: Accept Header [Do not change this value]

parameters.name: app_id
parameters.description: app_id (also referred to as recipient_id, provided by Kipu)

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: Accept Header [Do not change this value]

parameters.name: app_id
parameters.description: app_id (also referred to as recipient_id, provided by Kipu)

parameters.name: patient_id
parameters.description: fetches the appointments for the provided patient_id

parameters.name: resource_id
parameters.description: fetches the appointments for the provided resource_id

parameters.name: telehealth_session_only
parameters.description: fetches the appointments with telehealth_session as true

parameters.name: include_group_sessions
parameters.description: extends the result set to have group session appointments as well

parameters.name: include_resources
parameters.description: includes an extra key resources in each appointment block

parameters.name: location_ids
parameters.description: fetches the appointments belonging to the provided locations

parameters.name: patient_appointment_status_ids
parameters.description: fetches the appointments with the provided patient_appointment_status

parameters.name: appointment_type_ids
parameters.description: fetches the appointments with the given appointment type. Is ignored in case of group session appointments

parameters.name: admissions
parameters.description: Set to "true" to return care teams from Patient Admissions filters. Otherwise, results are from the Patient Census filters

parameters.description: if true returns patient records that have an MR #

parameters.name: evaluation_id
parameters.description: Lists patient evaluations scoped to the given template id

parameters.name: completed_only
parameters.description: Includes only the Patient Evaluations with status completed

parameters.name: current_census_only
parameters.description: Includes only the Patient Evaluations with patient in current census

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Start Date (Example: 2018-12-01) of the latest updated range

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: End Date (Example: 2018-12-03) of the latest updated range

parameters.name: include_stranded
parameters.description: Include Patient Evaluations not having Patient Id

parameters.name: patient_process_id
parameters.description: Includes only the Patient Evaluations with given patient process id

parameters.name: evaluation_content
parameters.description: Includes only the Patient Evaluations with given evaluation_content value
